hymn.title: Matthew, the Gospel
hymn.chords: | C - F/C - | C - F G | C - F/C - | C - - - | Dm - Dm7/C - | G/B - G - | F - - - | G - G/B - | C - F/C - | C - F G | C - F/C - | C - C/G - | C - C/G - | C - C/E - | Dm7 - G - | C F/C C - |

layout.singingstanza: Mat -- thew, the gos -- pel of Je -- sus, the Christ, who came as the King to es -- tab -- lish His king -- dom. Re -- com -- mend -- ed and a -- noint -- ed, test -- ed, tried, and still re -- ject -- ed, Je -- sus, king -- ly Sav -- ior! His min -- is -- try, par -- a -- bles, Heal -- ing, au -- thor -- i -- ty, Cru -- ci -- fix -- ion, then ris -- ing in vic -- t'ry: Sowed He forth the king -- dom seed, He's com -- ing back some day to reap it! Je -- sus, King of Kings!
layout.sheetcopyright: www.hymnal.net; © 2006 Bible StorySongs, Inc. Used by permission.

lyrics.stanza: Matthew, the gospel of Jesus, the Christ, who Came as the King to establish His kingdom. Recommended and anointed, tested, Tried, and still rejected, Jesus, kingly Savior! His ministry, parables, Healing, authority, Crucifixion, then rising in vict'ry: Sowed He forth the kingdom seed, He's coming back some day to reap it! Jesus, King of Kings!
